description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension; new  roof lights to front roof slope; erection of single storey lower ground floor rear extension; addition of railings on top of brick wall; replacement of windows & doors to front & rear elevation. Conversion of two flats into a single dwellinghouse.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6fbfbcee-7fff-38ee-77d0-9d601f5e76b3"></span></p><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-565d7c13-7fff-001b-8eb3-41cd4554d0d7"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150 mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume. </span></span></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-565d7c13-7fff-001b-8eb3-41cd4554d0d7"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></span></div><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-565d7c13-7fff-001b-8eb3-41cd4554d0d7"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To prevent surface water flooding. <br></span></span><font color="#222222" face="Arial"><span style="font-size: 14.6667px; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></font></div>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-131b23b8-7fff-21f3-6830-efdc0b082da1"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The roof lights shown in drawing PR200 P2&nbsp; shall be flushed with the roof slopes. Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the relevant work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved. Full details of design, type, section through, and its relationship with the roof slopes shall be provided. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To reduce the visual impact on the street scene.</span></p>

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.

REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:15299,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:65280},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority, in writing, before the relevant work starts. The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
